name: Odelinde
description: During the witch trials of 15th century France, a young noble named Odelinde discovers that she contains a familial magic. She flees to a separate world outside of reality in search of her grandmother, Blanchefluer. Blanche is known through the town as the noble who also was accused of witchcraft and set to burn, but makes an escape into the same realm Odelinde finds herself in. Accompanied by her pet cat Trompeur, Odelinde is on a mission to find her grandmother to instruct her with her newfound magic, but will what she find become something she isn't prepared for?
